sarah_parents.check: She hasn't seen them for a few weeks, so decides to visit.
sarah_parents.response: There was no reply when Sarah knocked on the door. Her parents had decided to go to the shops, even though they are usually at home on Saturday afternoon.
blue_team.check: The blue team want to win against the red team. They are playing football.
blue_team.response: The blue team had a player sent off due to a refereeing mistake. The red team were able to claw a couple of goals back. The blue team lost confidence and their players were tiring. The red team scored again and, in the last minute, equalised. The match went to extra time, momentum carrying the red to victory over the demoralised blues.
bill_holiday.check: He is looking forward to the holiday because he has been working hard for months.
bill_holiday.response: Bill, already feeling fed-up, is told that requesting a new passport will be time consuming and expensive. Then he realises the passport was in his coat pocket the whole time. He can catch his original fight, One silver lining in his disastrous trip.
john_party.check: They are having a dinner party.
john_party.response: John finds the peeler and prepares the potatoes perfectly. Problem solved... except the incident is the final straw for John. He tells his wife that he wants to divorce.
rebecca_swimming.check: She wants to go for a swim in the sea.
rebecca_swimming.response: Rebecca carries on anyway, life's too short to worry. But then a shark rears up from the water. She is doomed... until a freak lightning strike hits and kills the shark.
sally_wine.response: At home, there is a knock on the door. The neighbour feels bad about the argument. She invites Sally in to share a bottle of wine over dinner. They make amends and have an enjoyable evening.
belinda_meeting.check: She is going to LA for a business meeting.
belinda_meeting.response: The original meeting venue was closed due to an electrical fault. The meeting had to be rescheduled for a new venue... the office block which Belinda was mistakenly taken to!
lucy_loan.response: Lucy changes her mind and decides to keep the car, putting it into the garage for the work needed to keep it roadworthy. 'Wreck' is subjective, she thinks. Some things are worth keeping!
michael_breakfast.check: He goes downstairs to eat breakfast.
michael_breakfast.response: Michael sees a packet of coffee, a drink he has never enjoyed. He decides to try it... and really enjoys the taste. He feels cheered ahead of the day to come.
sean_call.check: Contact his mother from a foreign country to tell her he is safe.
sean_call.response: Sean turns a corner... and sees his mother sitting outside a cafe! She had an unexpected short break from work and decided to surprise Sean by coming out to see him.

sarah_parents.check: Sarah decides to visit her parents because she has not seen them for a long period of time.
sarah_parents.response: When Sarah knocks on the door, it opens and it reveals her mother. Usually her father opens the door. Her mother is crying.
blue_team.check: The Blue Team is playing football, and they want to win their game against the Red Team.
blue_team.response: When the Blue Team is ahead by four goals by half-time, the quarterback from the Blue Team, wearing his Rabbit logo gear runs off the field and in doing so, runs too fast and trips, fracturing his ankle so he is unable to play.
bill_holiday.check: Bill is looking forward to his holidays because he has worked very hard for a long time and wants a break.
bill_holiday.response: When Bill finally returns home from his terrible vacation, he learns that his wife purposefully misplaced his luggage just to make him angry after he irritated her the previous week.
john_party.check: John and his wife are preparing dinner for a dinner party they are having later that evening.
john_party.response: After his wife says he made a mess of the potato peelings, he throws them down in frustration and tells her to do them instead if she's so good at it, and then storms out of the room.
rebecca_swimming.check: Rebecca wants to swim in the sea while visiting the beach.
rebecca_swimming.response: Rebecca didn't previously realize that the sea was unsafe that day due to  high winds offshore, which coincidentally create a powerful storm system, thus causing bad weather. Rebecca loses her goggles while rushing home.
sally_wine.check: Sally wants to buy a bottle of wine to have with her Friday dinner.
sally_wine.response: The shop owner is actually Sally's neighbor, Sally argues that he should be in the shop right now instead of making people find another place to go.
belinda_meeting.check: Belinda is travelling to Los Angeles for a business meeting.
belinda_meeting.response: Belinda is early as she was dropped off at the wrong block, but she meets a fellow co-worker who also was dropped off in the wrong place. They become better friends.
lucy_loan.check: Lucy wants to buy a new care because her current car is too old.
lucy_loan.response: When the dealership says Lucy's car has no value, a kind old couple overhear and offer her their old car which they are about to trade in. Lucy can keep her car that holds sentimental value to her.
michael_breakfast.check: Michael goes downstairs so that he can prepare himself some breakfast with tea.
michael_breakfast.response: When Michael finds that he is unable to locate his tea bags, he is reminded of poorer times when he was a university student. His gaze moves from his would-be tea stash to the window, which is broken. His tea, along with other items are missing.
sean_call.check: Sean wants to speak to his mother and let her know that he is safe in the foreign country he is currently in.
sean_call.response: Sean is anxious that the weak signal will cut off the call with his mother, but he's even more surprised when he suddenly finds himself listening in to a tapped line. He hears voices discussing launch codes and an invasion.

sarah_parents.check: Sarah wants to visit her parents because she hasn't seen them for weeks and it is a nice day outside to visit them.
sarah_parents.response: I would like to think that the unexpected event could be that her parents aren't home as a result of a tragic event such as a loved one's death.
blue_team.check: The blue team want to win against the Red team in football
blue_team.response: A miracle happens, and the Red Teams star quarter-back throws 5 touch-down passes in a row winning them the championship.
bill_holiday.check: Bill is looking forward to his holidays because he has been working hard for months at his job.
bill_holiday.response: Then one day, Bill receives a phone-call from the airport saing that they found his luggage and to apolgize for the lost luggage, the airport offers Bill a all-paid-expense trip to a location of Bill's choosing.
john_party.check: John and his wife are having a dinner party that evening.
john_party.response: Since John cannot find the potato peeler, he uses a kitchen knife instead and severely cuts his finger leading him to be rushed to the hospital.
rebecca_swimming.check: Rebecca wants to go to the beach to take a swim in the sea.
rebecca_swimming.response: The bad weather lets up, and the sun comes out. The lifeguard is suprised, but gives everyone on the beach permission to swim in the ocean waters.
sally_wine.check: Sally wants to buy a bottle of wine for her Friday evening dinner.
sally_wine.response: As Sally and her nieghbour are arguing, they aren't looking where they are going and walk out in the middle of the street. A car comes racing by and almost hits Sally.
belinda_meeting.check: Belinder is going to Los Angeles for a business meeting.
belinda_meeting.response: A worker at the meeting venue sees that Belinda has arrived early, and they strike up a conversation. Belinda ends up learning alot abot the people who she is about to meet, and feels alot more prepared for the meeting.
lucy_loan.check: Lucy wants to buy a new car for herself
lucy_loan.response: A customer overhears Lucy talking with the car dealer, and pulls her aside and offers her double the price she paid for the old car. The customer happens to have a knack for old cars and Lucy's car is the model he was looking for to finish his car collection.
michael_breakfast.check: Michael does downstairs to eat his breakfast and make some morning tea.
michael_breakfast.response: Micheal gets a flash-back to his college days at the university, when he failed a morning final because he stayed up all night and in the morning before the final, he could not find his tea-bags to brew some tea to help him stay awake.
sean_call.check: Sean wants to let her mother know that he is safe in the foreign country but cannot contact her because of the poor phone signal.
sean_call.response: A tourist on the street sees Sean is clearly distressed and offers their phone to Sean so Sean can call his mother.
